about_the_game:
This is a virtual museum tour game. In the game, players will delve into the Chinese Museum, the History Museum, and the Cybersteampunk Museum from a first-person perspective, and explore these places full of history and culture for themselves.



The first is the Chinese Museum. It has a large collection of Chinese historical relics, from ancient porcelain, calligraphy and paintings, to modern handicrafts and artworks, allowing people to appreciate the history of China's 5,000-year civilization. You can see these gems up close and learn about Chinese history and culture. Next up is the Historical Museum. It brings together historical relics and paleontological fossils from all over the world, allowing you to travel through time and space to feel the diversity of creatures and the charm of history in ancient times. You can touch the traces of these histories and feel the stories they tell. Finally, there is the Cybersteampunk Museum. The perfect combination of futuristic technology and retro elements is displayed here, and you can gain an in-depth understanding of this futuristic world full of mechanical aesthetics and retro feelings, and feel the collision of technology and history.
In the game, you are free to explore every corner of these museums, where you can enjoy, learn and explore to your heart's content, and feel the unique charm of virtual museums.

How it works:

Forward / Backward : Left handle up / down
Left/Right : Left handle left / right
Turn : Right handle left/right
Quit : Menu Key
Reset : Handle grip
